summary.markdown:
# SEC Filing Signal Lab — Results Summary

Dataset: 352 SEC filings, 107 companies
, 2023-10-18 to 2025-10-10


## Strongest Individual Features

- **spx_return_30d**: IC=-0.165, accuracy=43.8%, p=0.071
- **rsi14**: IC=-0.154, accuracy=56.3%, p=0.094
- **price_to_low**: IC=0.143, accuracy=53.5%, p=0.008
- **analyst_upside_potential**: IC=-0.130, accuracy=43.8%, p=0.016
- **risk_score**: IC=-0.130, accuracy=57.4%, p=0.017
- **price_to_high**: IC=0.127, accuracy=45.3%, p=0.019
- **analyst_coverage**: IC=0.117, accuracy=54.4%, p=0.032
- **analyst_consensus_score**: IC=0.116, accuracy=56.8%, p=0.030

## Best Model by Horizon

- **7D**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=-0.0367)
- **30D**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=0.0064)
- **7D_alpha**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=0.0055)
- **30D_alpha**: Stepwise+Ridge (CV R²=0.0375)
